Language.entry: Just think of all the time you could save collecting geo with this.\n\nTime is money, right? Definitely worth it.
If you can't keep your bearings without this you should probably just stop playing randomizer.
What's better than being rewarded for getting hit? Amazing charm if you suck.
Now all you need is quick slash, longnail, and mark of pride. Reddit's favorite charm build!\n\nReddit is never wrong, after all.
It's like dreamshield, but cheaper and better at blocking damage.
Sure, you COULD stay at 1 health with this, but a real gamer would stay at 2.\n\nDon't forget to pogo everything, too.
Mickely's favorite charm.
With this on, you'll be able to tank a whole two more hits. Amazing.
Let's be honest, here. This isn't a progression item or a spell buff, so nobody will buy it.\n\nJust a waste of space, really.
Haha poo.
RIP Flukenest 2017-2018.
It's a good thing thorn warps got patched so fast. Wouldn't want any cheaters in my randomizer.
Three notches to slightly extend the range of my weakest attack? Sign me up!
You ever feel like you don't walk into enemies during combat enough? Well I have just the charm for you!
If you've got Kerr's charm modifications on, buying this could be a real blast.
Such an amazing charm it has its own mod dedicated to it. What fool wouldn't buy this?
Man it'd be a real bummer if you had to buy this garbage to leave Crossroads.
This is technically enough to kill baldurs, but you're not that crazy.\n\nAt least I hope you aren't.
You obviously want to buy this. But is it worth the cost?\n\n(Spoilers: yes.)
You'd have to be really hurting for damage to buy this, of all things.
Who would ever use this charm? The effect is amazing, but come on. Four notches?
Back in my day we had to jump through tunnels of spikes to get something like this.
Wow two hearts? That's eight mask shards you don't have to collect.
Gotta spend money to make money. I'm sure it'll pay for itself in no time at all.
Wow this is a steal! Unbreakable normally adds 15k, so really you'd be a fool to not buy at this price.
Who uses nail arts? Probably nobody now that the dash slash skips are gone.
What do you mean I can't heal with this on?
You want to turn into a snail? Of course not. This is a piece of garbage.\n\nSave your money for something else.
Basically required to get through the hive alive. Better hope nothing is in there.
Most people who play probably don't even know the dream nail gives you soul.\n\nMaybe that's why this is only one notch?
Not worth the money unless you're using glitches. You're not a cheater, are you?
Time to tank and spam nail. Strategy of champions.
You know how this is normally surrounded by mistakes? Reminds me of anime.
You ever wonder what it would be like if healing took so long you just get hit?
Play lightbringer.
That's right, I'm not even going to give you the full charm. That's how little I value your business.
You want half of a charm? Well today is your lucky day!
Don't worry about shade skips, I'm changing this to not modify shade behaviour.
Go faster! But only when on the ground. And also only when walking. Oh and also it's a very minor speed boost.
This should really be a one notch charm. Hell, even at one, I wouldn't use this.
This is a good charm after the buffs in Lifeblood, right?
Most people would pay money to get rid of this trash, yet here you are contemplating spending money on it.
A swarm will follow the bearer and gather up any loose Geo.
Useful for those who can't bear to leave anything behind, no matter how insignificant.
You already know what to press
This key may be required to enter waterways. Think hard before opening! Use simple key?
This key may be required to enter waterways. Think hard before opening! Use simple key?
Not enough.
F-for me..? Senpai you're so kind.
F-for me..? Senpai you're so kind.
Thank you senpai!
O-oh...
Give Elderbug-chan the flower?
I'm not so hard? Are you kidding me?
Input Lag:
Leave on to make the game unplayable.
Elderbug
is a cool dude
